original_title: Porque não sou o Giacometti do Século XXI
overview: “Since 2011, as an author and in a frantic and committed fashion, I record music and dance expressions of various kinds all over the country. From a great conversation with film director Inês Oliveira, who followed my work for a while, I raise fundamental questions in this film: Why do I do what I do? What is this all about? What are the relationships with the people? What differentiates me from scientific work? What is tradition?” — Tiago Pereira.

production_companies.name: A Música Portuguesa A Gostar Dela Própria

title: … because I am not the 21st Century’s Giacometti
